summary: Morrowind Dwemer Resources is a conversion of David Brasher's Dwemer Ruins modders resource for [i]The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion[/i]. It brings [i]The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind[/i]-style Dwemer architecture and dungeon tilesets to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]Original[/b] | [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/190]Special Edition[/url][/center]

[b]Morrowind Dwemer Resources[/b] is a conversion of David Brasher's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/38163]Dwemer Ruins[/url] modders resource for [i]The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion[/i]. It brings [i]The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind[/i]-style Dwemer architecture and dungeon tilesets to Skyrim.

[b][u]What has and hasn't been ported[/u][/b]
Almost all of the original models from the TES4 modders resource have been ported.

Those that couldn't be converted to work properly in the TES5 engine have been excluded, including the NPC dwarven constructs.

All but one piece of clutter has been excluded in favor of redirecting modders to download InsanitySorrow's [url=http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1410-insanitys-dwemer-clutter]Dwemer Clutter[/url] resource, which contains higher quality models and textures.

[b][u]Additional modders resource recommendations[/u][/b]
For more classic Dwemer resources, the following mods are available:
[list][*][url=http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1410-insanitys-dwemer-clutter]Insanity's Dwemer Clutter[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35854]Insanity's Dwemer Weapons[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44179]Lore Weapon Expansion[/url]* (includes TES3 dwarven dagger)
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55934]Old Dwarven Katana and Daito[/url]*
[/list]
* = requires author's permission to use in mods

[b][u]TES5 - Original & Special Edition Compatibility[/u][/b]
This resource's assets are compatible with [u]both[/u] the original TES5 and TES5 - Special Edition. The included plug-ins intended only for reference have been saved in the original Creation Kit, but will load just fine in the SSE Creation Kit.

[b][u]Mods that use this resource pack[/u][/b]
[i]If you want your mod added to this list, you may post a comment or send a PM to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/407469]Enter_77[/url].[/i]
[list][*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16021]Maids II: Deception[/url]
[/list]
author: David Brasher and Enter_77

files.name: Morrowind Dwemer Resources
files.changelogHtml: REMOVED – Redundant white vertex colors on numerous models
